items.checkin_comment: TBD #14 - Full bodied fruity juicy with citrus, pineapple, passionfruit and mango with sime pine. Brewed using Clayton Hops’ concentrated advanced hop product, using it in Motueka form along with El Dorado, Simcoe, Amarillo and Vic Secret.

items.badge_name: Super Style: IPA - New England / Hazy (Level 47)
items.badge_description: The haze craze is here for days. The third in our series of “Super Style” badges, this one celebrates New England-style / hazy IPAs, which ranked as the 2nd most checked-in style of 2021. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.

items.checkin_comment: Very good hazy! Fruity, citrus, right amount of hop.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
